movements.notes: Repeat (transposed to C Major) of the first movement of the quartet in D Major Op. 52 no. 2 of 1795 (No. 233, Incipit No. 519)
Repeat of the second movement of the quartet in C Major Op. 53 no. 3 of 1796 (No. 238, Incipit No. 536)
Arrangement of the first movement of the double 'cello quintet in C Minor Op. 51 no. 2 of 1795 (No. 377, Incipit No. 943)
Repeat of the first movement of the quartet in C Major Op. 53 no. 3 of 1796 (No. 238, Incipit No. 535)

sources.autograph: Washington, Library of Congress (for reference number, title and comment, see No. 250)

entries.notes: Arrangement by Boccherini himself? No reference in Boccherini's autograph catalogue. For comment as to authenticity, see No. 250. Unpublished.

sources.autograph: Washington, Library of Congress (for reference number, title and comment, see No. 250)

entries.notes: Arrangement by Boccherini himself? No reference in Boccherini's autograph catalogue. For comment as to authenticity, see No. 250. Arrangement of the whole of the trio in A Major Op. 54 no. 6 of 1796 (No. 118). Unpublished.
